mapper.insert: insert into tp_video(category_id, name, origin_name, introduction, duration, file_size, url, thumb_url, create_time, update_time) values(#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{originName}, #{introduction}, #{duration}, #{fileSize}, #{url}, #{thumbUrl}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update tp_video
category_id = #{categoryId},
name = #{name},
origin_name = #{originName},
introduction = #{introduction},
duration = #{duration},
file_size = #{fileSize},
url = #{url},
thumb_url = #{thumbUrl},
update_time = #{updateTime}
id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from tp_video order by create_time
select * from tp_video order by create_time
select v.*, c.name category_name from tp_video v left join tp_category c on v.category_id = c.id where v.id = #{id}
